text: Little things that no one needs -- Little things to joke about --
Little things to joke about -- Little landscapes, done in beads.
Little landscapes, done in beads. Little morals, woven out,
Little morals, woven out, Little wreaths of gilded grass,
Little wreaths of gilded grass, Little brigs of whittled oak
Little brigs of whittled oak%% Bottled painfully in glass;
Bottled painfully in glass; These are made by lonely folk.
These are made by lonely folk. Lonely folk have lines of days
Lonely folk have lines of days%% Long and faltering and thin;
Long and faltering and thin; Therefore -- little wax bouquets,
Therefore -- little wax bouquets, Prayers cut upon a pin,
Prayers cut upon a pin, Little maps of pinkish lands,
Little maps of pinkish lands, Little charts of curly seas,
Little charts of curly seas, Little plats of linen strands,
Little plats of linen strands, Little verses, such as these.
